ValidationRule.description: Rule to complete the Lighting Design Detail section to advance to In progress or further statuses.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(ISPICKVAL( Photometric_Design__c , "") , ISPICKVAL( Project_Fixture_Quantity__c, "" ), ISBLANK( Spectrum__c ) , ISPICKVAL( Flex_Design__c, "" ) , ISBLANK( Fixtures_used_in_design__c), ISPICKVAL( DesignRevision__c, "" )) , RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISCHANGED(Status), OR( ISPICKVAL ( Status, "FAE Review"), ISPICKVAL ( Status, "Complete"), ISPICKVAL ( Status, "Closed") ), NOT(Opportunity__r.IsClosed) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete all fields in the Lighting Design Details section.
